attributes.action: Explain why people are dying in Britain bacause they can't afford to heat their homes .

rejection.details:
There are already a number of petitions that relate to the extension of cold weather payments which we suggest you look at. The Prime Minister takes this issue very seriously and recently said: "Already about £172 million has been paid to around 3½ million elderly and vulnerable people through the cold weather payments system... 
These - and the winter fuel allowances - are paid automatically to all those entitled and so no one should worry about turning up their heating."
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
